column4: Uh... there's an awesome help page the help bot in here quotes, it's for editing the xorg.conf file to get the screen resolution and horizontal and vertical line numbers correct. Can someone quote me that link?

Uh... there's an awesome help page the help bot in here quotes, it's for editing the xorg.conf file to get the screen resolution and horizontal and vertical line numbers correct. Can someone quote me that link?
Let me rephrase that. My screen won't go to 1024 x 768, can someone help me please?????
